page.title: 10OUR HOBBIES-2
page.content: I sail with my mummy or daddy and sometimes with my brothers .I race in the boat .Our Mirror is the slowest boat that races,and I always {come {last}. Another of my hobbies is scouts.I go every Tuesday night at Tavistock.We go on hikes , camps and wide games etc.You have to try and get badges . There are many proficency badges and there is the Scout Award ,Pathfinder, Explorer, and Chief Scout Award.When you join you go into a Troop.You then go into a small group of boys called a Patrol. Iam in Hawks. BENJAMIN WIGGINS. I like helping my dad on his farm, especialy in the summer when we do hay and straw.When we pick the bales up we do it by hand, and tractor and trailer and when we move on to another pile of bales my dad lets me drive.
